trans-unit.source: Quick start guide for the Machine Learning Recommendations API | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Quick start guide for the Machine Learning Recommendations API | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Azure Machine Learning Recommendations - Quick Start Guide
trans-unit.target: Azure Machine Learning Recommendations - Quick Start Guide

trans-unit.source: Quick start guide for the Machine Learning Recommendations API
trans-unit.target: Quick start guide for the Machine Learning Recommendations API

trans-unit.source: This document depicts how to onboard your service or application to use Azure ML Recommendations.
trans-unit.target: This document depicts how to onboard your service or application to use Azure ML Recommendations.

trans-unit.source: To use Azure ML Recommendations you need to do the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To use Azure ML Recommendations you need to do the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Create a Model - A model is a container of your usage data, catalog data and the recommendation model.
trans-unit.target: Create a Model - A model is a container of your usage data, catalog data and the recommendation model.

trans-unit.source: Import catalog data - This is an optional step.
trans-unit.target: Import catalog data - This is an optional step.

trans-unit.source: A catalog contains meta-data information on the items.
trans-unit.target: A catalog contains meta-data information on the items.

trans-unit.source: If you do not upload catalog data, the recommendations services will learn about your catalog implicitly from the usage data.
trans-unit.target: If you do not upload catalog data, the recommendations services will learn about your catalog implicitly from the usage data.

trans-unit.source: Import usage data - Usage data can be uploaded in one of 2 ways (or both):
trans-unit.target: Import usage data - Usage data can be uploaded in one of 2 ways (or both):

trans-unit.source: By uploading a file that contains the usage data.
trans-unit.target: By uploading a file that contains the usage data.

trans-unit.source: Usually you upload a usage file in order to be able to create an initial recommendation model (bootstrap) and use it until the system gathers enough data using the data acquisition format.
trans-unit.target: Usually you upload a usage file in order to be able to create an initial recommendation model (bootstrap) and use it until the system gathers enough data using the data acquisition format.

trans-unit.source: Build a recommendation model - this is an asynchronous operation in which the recommendation system takes all the usage data and creates a recommendation model.
trans-unit.target: Build a recommendation model - this is an asynchronous operation in which the recommendation system takes all the usage data and creates a recommendation model.

trans-unit.source: This operation can take several minutes or several hours depending on the size of the data and the build configuration parameters.
trans-unit.target: This operation can take several minutes or several hours depending on the size of the data and the build configuration parameters.

trans-unit.source: When triggering the build you will get a build id, use it to check when the build process has ended before starting to consume recommendations.
trans-unit.target: When triggering the build you will get a build id, use it to check when the build process has ended before starting to consume recommendations.

trans-unit.source: Recommendations consumption - get recommendations for a specific item or list of items.
trans-unit.target: Recommendations consumption - get recommendations for a specific item or list of items.

trans-unit.source: All the steps above are done through Azure ML Recommendations API.
trans-unit.target: All the steps above are done through Azure ML Recommendations API.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of models per subscription: 10
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of models per subscription: 10

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of items that a catalog can hold: 100,000
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of items that a catalog can hold: 100,000

trans-unit.source: The maximum amount of usage points that are kept is ~5,000,000.
trans-unit.target: The maximum amount of usage points that are kept is ~5,000,000.

trans-unit.source: The oldest will be deleted if new ones will be uploaded or reported.
trans-unit.target: The oldest will be deleted if new ones will be uploaded or reported.

trans-unit.source: Maximum size of data can be sent in POST (e.g. Import catalog data, import usage data) is 200MB.
trans-unit.target: Maximum size of data can be sent in POST (e.g. Import catalog data, import usage data) is 200MB.

trans-unit.source: The number of transactions per second for a recommendation model build that is not active is ~2TPS, only recommendation model build that is active can hold up to 20TPS.
trans-unit.target: The number of transactions per second for a recommendation model build that is not active is ~2TPS, only recommendation model build that is active can hold up to 20TPS.

trans-unit.source: Please follow the Microsoft Azure Marketplace guidelines regarding authentication.
trans-unit.target: Please follow the Microsoft Azure Marketplace guidelines regarding authentication.

trans-unit.source: The marketplace supports either Basic or OAuth authentication methods.
trans-unit.target: The marketplace supports either Basic or OAuth authentication methods.

trans-unit.source: The service root URIs for each of the Azure ML Recommendations APIs is <link><linkText>here.</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: The service root URIs for each of the Azure ML Recommendations APIs is <link><linkText>here.</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: The full service URI is expressed using elements of the OData specification.
trans-unit.target: The full service URI is expressed using elements of the OData specification.

trans-unit.source: Each API call will have at the end query parameter called apiVersion that should be set to "1.0".
trans-unit.target: Each API call will have at the end query parameter called apiVersion that should be set to "1.0".

trans-unit.source: Only letters (A-Z, a-z), numbers (0-9), hyphens (-) and underscore (_) are allowed.<html></html>Max length: 20
trans-unit.target: Only letters (A-Z, a-z), numbers (0-9), hyphens (-) and underscore (_) are allowed.<html></html>Max length: 20

trans-unit.source: If you upload several catalog files to the same model with several calls we will insert only the new catalog items.
trans-unit.target: If you upload several catalog files to the same model with several calls we will insert only the new catalog items.

trans-unit.source: Existing items will remain with the original values.
trans-unit.target: Existing items will remain with the original values.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the model.
trans-unit.target: The unique identifier of the model.

trans-unit.source: Textual identifier of the catalog.<html></html>Only letters (A-Z, a-z), numbers (0-9), hyphens (-) and underscore (_) are allowed<html></html>Max length: 50
trans-unit.target: Textual identifier of the catalog.<html></html>Only letters (A-Z, a-z), numbers (0-9), hyphens (-) and underscore (_) are allowed<html></html>Max length: 50

trans-unit.source: The catalog data. Format:,,[,]NameMandatoryTypeDescriptionItem IdYesAlphanumeric, Max Length 50Unique identifier of an ItemItem NameYesAlphanumeric, Max Length 255The Item NameItem CategoryYesAlphanumeric, Max Length 255The category to which this item belongs (e.g. Cooking Books, Drama…)DescriptionNoAlphanumeric, Max Length 4000A description of this itemMaximum file size 200MBExample:2406e770-769c-4189-89de-1c9283f93a96,Clara Callan,Book21bf8088-b6c0-4509-870c-e1c7ac78304a,The Forgetting Room: A Fiction (Byzantium Book),Book3bb5cb44-d143-4bdd-a55c-443964bf4b23,Spadework,Book552a1940-21e4-4399-82bb-594b46d7ed54,Restraint of Beasts,Book
trans-unit.target: The catalog data. Format:,,[,]NameMandatoryTypeDescriptionItem IdYesAlphanumeric, Max Length 50Unique identifier of an ItemItem NameYesAlphanumeric, Max Length 255The Item NameItem CategoryYesAlphanumeric, Max Length 255The category to which this item belongs (e.g. Cooking Books, Drama…)DescriptionNoAlphanumeric, Max Length 4000A description of this itemMaximum file size 200MBExample:2406e770-769c-4189-89de-1c9283f93a96,Clara Callan,Book21bf8088-b6c0-4509-870c-e1c7ac78304a,The Forgetting Room: A Fiction (Byzantium Book),Book3bb5cb44-d143-4bdd-a55c-443964bf4b23,Spadework,Book552a1940-21e4-4399-82bb-594b46d7ed54,Restraint of Beasts,Book

trans-unit.source: This sections shows how to upload usage data using a file.
trans-unit.target: This sections shows how to upload usage data using a file.

trans-unit.source: You can call this API several times with usage data.
trans-unit.target: You can call this API several times with usage data.

trans-unit.source: All usage data will be saved for all calls.
trans-unit.target: All usage data will be saved for all calls.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the model.
trans-unit.target: The unique identifier of the model.

trans-unit.source: Textual identifier of the catalog.<html></html>Only letters (A-Z, a-z), numbers (0-9), hyphens (-) and underscore (_) are allowed<html></html>Max length: 50
trans-unit.target: Textual identifier of the catalog.<html></html>Only letters (A-Z, a-z), numbers (0-9), hyphens (-) and underscore (_) are allowed<html></html>Max length: 50

trans-unit.source: The usage data. Format:,[,,]NameMandatoryTypeDescriptionUser IdYesAlphanumericUnique identifier of a UserItem IdYesAlphanumeric, Max Length 50Unique identifier of an ItemTimeNoDate in format: YYYY/MM/DDTHH:MM:SS (e.g. 2013/06/20T10:00:00)Time of dataEventNo, if supplied then must also put dateOne of the following:• Click• RecommendationClick• AddShopCart• RemoveShopCart• PurchaseMaximum file size 200MBExample:149452,1b3d95e2-84e4-414c-bb38-be9cf461c3476360,1b3d95e2-84e4-414c-bb38-be9cf461c34750321,1b3d95e2-84e4-414c-bb38-be9cf461c34771285,1b3d95e2-84e4-414c-bb38-be9cf461c347224450,1b3d95e2-84e4-414c-bb38-be9cf461c347236645,1b3d95e2-84e4-414c-bb38-be9cf461c347107951,1b3d95e2-84e4-414c-bb38-be9cf461c347
trans-unit.target: The usage data. Format:,[,,]NameMandatoryTypeDescriptionUser IdYesAlphanumericUnique identifier of a UserItem IdYesAlphanumeric, Max Length 50Unique identifier of an ItemTimeNoDate in format: YYYY/MM/DDTHH:MM:SS (e.g. 2013/06/20T10:00:00)Time of dataEventNo, if supplied then must also put dateOne of the following:• Click• RecommendationClick• AddShopCart• RemoveShopCart• PurchaseMaximum file size 200MBExample:149452,1b3d95e2-84e4-414c-bb38-be9cf461c3476360,1b3d95e2-84e4-414c-bb38-be9cf461c34750321,1b3d95e2-84e4-414c-bb38-be9cf461c34771285,1b3d95e2-84e4-414c-bb38-be9cf461c347224450,1b3d95e2-84e4-414c-bb38-be9cf461c347236645,1b3d95e2-84e4-414c-bb38-be9cf461c347107951,1b3d95e2-84e4-414c-bb38-be9cf461c347

trans-unit.source: This section shows how to send events in real time to Azure ML Recommendations usually from your web site.
trans-unit.target: This section shows how to send events in real time to Azure ML Recommendations usually from your web site.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the model.
trans-unit.target: The unique identifier of the model.

trans-unit.source: Textual identifier of the catalog. Note that if you use spaces you must encode it with %20 instead. See example above.<html></html>Max length: 50
trans-unit.target: Textual identifier of the catalog. Note that if you use spaces you must encode it with %20 instead. See example above.<html></html>Max length: 50

trans-unit.source: Get Builds Status of a Model
trans-unit.target: Get Builds Status of a Model

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the model.
trans-unit.target: The unique identifier of the model.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to return all the build history of the model or only the status of the most recent build.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether to return all the build history of the model or only the status of the most recent build.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the model.
trans-unit.target: The unique identifier of the model.

trans-unit.source: Comma separated list of the items to recommend for.<html></html>Max length: 200
trans-unit.target: Comma separated list of the items to recommend for.<html></html>Max length: 200

trans-unit.source: You can update the model description or the active build id.
trans-unit.target: You can update the model description or the active build id.

trans-unit.source: Active Build Id - Every build for every model has a “build id”.
trans-unit.target: Active Build Id - Every build for every model has a “build id”.

trans-unit.source: The active “build id” is the first successfully build of every new model.
trans-unit.target: The active “build id” is the first successfully build of every new model.

trans-unit.source: Once you have an active build Id and you do additional builds for the same model you need to explicitly set it as the default build id if you want to.
trans-unit.target: Once you have an active build Id and you do additional builds for the same model you need to explicitly set it as the default build id if you want to.

trans-unit.source: When you consume recommendations, if you do not specify the build id that you want to use - the default one will be used automatically.
trans-unit.target: When you consume recommendations, if you do not specify the build id that you want to use - the default one will be used automatically.

trans-unit.source: This mechanism enables you once you have a recommendation model in production to build new models and test them before you promote them to production.
trans-unit.target: This mechanism enables you once you have a recommendation model in production to build new models and test them before you promote them to production.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the model.
trans-unit.target: The unique identifier of the model.

trans-unit.source: New Description -1Note that the xml tags Description and ActiveBuildId are optional, If you do not want to set Description or ActiveBuildId remove the entire tag.
trans-unit.target: New Description -1Note that the xml tags Description and ActiveBuildId are optional, If you do not want to set Description or ActiveBuildId remove the entire tag.
